src:
無施錠の玄関、首絞められ死亡した女性発見…死後数日か

03 Nov 2019, 23:02

　２日午後３時５５分頃、青森県八戸市市川町の民家で、住人の無職大日向茂子さん（８１）が倒れて死亡しているのを知人女性が発見し、近所の男性を通じて１１９番した。司法解剖の結果、死因は首を絞められたことによる窒息死と判明。県警は３日夜、八戸署に捜査本部を設置し、殺人事件として捜査している。
　発表によると、大日向さんは一人暮らし。連絡が取れなかったことから知人が訪れたところ、玄関でうつぶせで倒れていた。玄関は無施錠だった。首以外に目立った外傷はなく、死後数日が経過しているとみられる。
　現場はＪＲ八戸駅から北に約６キロ離れた古い民家が密集した地域。
text:
Unlocked front door, finding a dead woman who has been strangled ... a few days after death

03 Nov 2019, 23:02

At around 3:55 pm on the 2nd, an acquaintance woman discovered that a resident unemployed Shigeko Ohinata (81) fell down in a private house in Ichikawa-cho, Hachinohe, Aomori Prefecture, and numbered 119 through a nearby man. . As a result of judicial dissection, the cause of death was found to be death from suffocation due to strangling. The prefectural police set up an investigation headquarters at the Hachinohe Station on the night of the 3rd, and are investigating as a murder case.
According to the announcement, Mr. Ohinata lives alone. When an acquaintance visited because he couldn't get in touch, he was lying down at the entrance. The entrance was unlocked. There is no conspicuous trauma other than the neck, and it seems that several days have passed since death.
The site is a densely populated old house about 6 km north of JR Hachinohe Station.
